reviewText: It's a nice format with a mix of tasks, but the whole game can be played in an hour or so, with no variation. Not worth the money.

reviewText:
Product received for free

Fun and pretty adventure game.  Straightforward, solid and well done.  Very light combo of hidden object, point-and-click adventure and infotainment.

Here's a link to my video review of the game for JustAdventure.com:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3r8oPWJW1u0
Short but sweet. Only buy if it's on a sale.
voteText: 3 of 5 people (60%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
Nice game. Remind me 'Ween The prophecy' and the good old times of clic based adventure games, with a bit of 'search the  item' style of games. Nice ambiance and arts.

To the guy who feel it's too short: at this price, i wouldn't expect the game to have 30 hours of gameplay. And if you take time to search instead of using help, it may be more interesting and with a longer play time it think :)

Thanks for this nice journey !
